comment: Smart Data Models - GovHydroWEH adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovHydroWEH/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Woodward Electric Hydro Governor Model.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: db
contents.comment: Speed Dead Band (db). Default: 0.0

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: dicn
contents.comment: Value to allow the integral controller to advance beyond the gate limits (Dicn). Default: 0.0

contents.name: dpv
contents.comment: Value to allow the Pilot valve controller to advance beyond the gate limits (Dpv). Default: 0.0

contents.name: dturb
contents.comment: Turbine damping factor (Dturb).  Unit = delta P (PU of MWbase) / delta speed (PU). Default: 0.0

contents.name: feedbackSignal
contents.comment: Feedback signal selection (Sw). true = PID Output (if R-Perm-Gate=droop and R-Perm-Pe=0) false = Electrical Power (if R-Perm-Gate=0 and R-Perm-Pe=droop) or false = Gate Position (if R-Perm-Gate=droop and R-Perm-Pe=0). Default: False

contents.name: fl1
contents.comment: Flow Gate 1 (Fl1).  Flow value for gate position point 1 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fl2
contents.comment: Flow Gate 2 (Fl2).  Flow value for gate position point 2 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fl3
contents.comment: Flow Gate 3 (Fl3).  Flow value for gate position point 3 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fl4
contents.comment: Flow Gate 4 (Fl4).  Flow value for gate position point 4 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fl5
contents.comment: Flow Gate 5 (Fl5).  Flow value for gate position point 5 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fp1
contents.comment: Flow P1 (Fp1).  Turbine Flow value for point 1 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fp10
contents.comment: Flow P10 (Fp10).  Turbine Flow value for point 10 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fp2
contents.comment: Flow P2 (Fp2).  Turbine Flow value for point 2 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fp3
contents.comment: Flow P3 (Fp3).  Turbine Flow value for point 3 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fp4
contents.comment: Flow P4 (Fp4).  Turbine Flow value for point 4 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fp5
contents.comment: Flow P5 (Fp5).  Turbine Flow value for point 5 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fp6
contents.comment: Flow P6 (Fp6).  Turbine Flow value for point 6 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fp7
contents.comment: Flow P7 (Fp7).  Turbine Flow value for point 7 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fp8
contents.comment: Flow P8 (Fp8).  Turbine Flow value for point 8 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fp9
contents.comment: Flow P9 (Fp9).  Turbine Flow value for point 9 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gmax
contents.comment: Maximum Gate Position (Gmax). Default: 0.0

contents.name: gmin
contents.comment: Minimum Gate Position (Gmin). Default: 0.0

contents.name: gtmxcl
contents.comment: Maximum gate closing rate (Gtmxcl). Default: 0.0

contents.name: gtmxop
contents.comment: Maximum gate opening rate (Gtmxop). Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv1
contents.comment: Gate 1 (Gv1).  Gate Position value for point 1 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv2
contents.comment: Gate 2 (Gv2).  Gate Position value for point 2 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv3
contents.comment: Gate 3 (Gv3).  Gate Position value for point 3 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv4
contents.comment: Gate 4 (Gv4).  Gate Position value for point 4 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv5
contents.comment: Gate 5 (Gv5).  Gate Position value for point 5 for lookup table representing water flow through the turbine as a function of gate position to produce steady state flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kd
contents.comment: Derivative controller derivative gain (Kd). Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Derivative controller Integral gain (Ki). Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Derivative control gain (Kp). Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pmss1
contents.comment: Pmss Flow P1 (Pmss1).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 1 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmss10
contents.comment: Pmss Flow P10 (Pmss10).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 10 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmss2
contents.comment: Pmss Flow P2 (Pmss2).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 2 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmss3
contents.comment: Pmss Flow P3 (Pmss3).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 3 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmss4
contents.comment: Pmss Flow P4 (Pmss4).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 4 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmss5
contents.comment: Pmss Flow P5 (Pmss5).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 5 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmss6
contents.comment: Pmss Flow P6 (Pmss6).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 6 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmss7
contents.comment: Pmss Flow P7 (Pmss7).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 7 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmss8
contents.comment: Pmss Flow P8 (Pmss8).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 8 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmss9
contents.comment: Pmss Flow P9 (Pmss9).  Mechanical Power output Pmss for Turbine Flow point 9 for lookup table representing per unit mechanical power on machine MVA rating as a function of turbine flow. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rpg
contents.comment: Permanent droop for governor output feedback (R-Perm-Gate). Default: 0.0

contents.name: rpp
contents.comment: Permanent droop for electrical power feedback (R-Perm-Pe). Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: td
contents.comment: Derivative controller time constant to limit the derivative characteristic beyond a breakdown frequency to avoid amplification of high-frequency noise (Td). Default: 0

contents.name: tdv
contents.comment: Distributive Valve time lag time constant (Tdv). Default: 0

contents.name: tg
contents.comment: Value to allow the Distribution valve controller to advance beyond the gate movement rate limit (Tg). Default: 0

contents.name: tp
contents.comment: Pilot Valve time lag time constant (Tp). Default: 0

contents.name: tpe
contents.comment: Electrical power droop time constant (Tpe). Default: 0

contents.name: tw
contents.comment: Water inertia time constant (Tw) (>0). Default: 0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
